author: bimsebasse
name: Óðinn
description:
Black metal theme innit.

Óðinn comes in a top panel version and a bottom panel version, you'll see why if you try to use the top panel version in a bottom panel layout, or vice versa. If you have a top+bottom panel setup - this theme ain't for you :o)

Font: Droid Sans
Metal
Panel
Wallpaper

Updates
- Dec 17, 2012: Improved workspaceOSD
- Dec 9, 2012: Revamped and fully updated for Cinnamon 1.6
